message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I'll give you a decent amount to start.
You're being too generous, Alice. I'll take a larger share this time.
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. No need to be greedy.
I'm not settling for the middle. I want more.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a better deal.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll take the upper hand now.
I'm not backing down, Bob. Meet me in the middle, or we'll both walk away with nothing.
I'm not going to back down now. Take it or leave it.
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or walk away.
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm taking control now.
This is my last stand, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not walking away with nothing.
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or we both walk away with nothing.
